did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: This collection consists of a 2011 calendar with information about the Doman family including a family genealogy chart, pictures of family members from different times and places and two letters written by Bruce Lemmert.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: No physical characteristics affect use of this material.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Doman Family Reunion Calendar (OM 014), Thomas Balch Library, Leesburg, VA.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Bruce Lemmert began genealogy research on his mother's family after he retired in the summer of 2010. He was raised in Frostburg, Maryland and attended Virginia Tech in Blacksburg, Virginia. He moved to Northern Virginia for his job as a Virginia Game Warden after college, and since then has lived in Loudoun County.

Bruce Lemmert's relatives provided many of the anecdotes while he researched the genealogy for a calendar about his family. Mr. Lemmert also utilized resources at Thomas Balch Library while working on his project. The genealogy research was put in the format of a calendar because it would be an easy way to display the research as well as pictures and would attract a wider audience.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a 2011 calendar with information about the Doman family including a family genealogy chart, pictures of family members from different times and places and two letters written by Bruce Lemmert.

bibliography.head: Bibliography
